author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Add tests for ```Get-Content -Tail ``` parameter:

Related code coverage report: 
https://codecov.io/gh/PowerShell/PowerShell/src/9e41c647a9407e05d86f4971a6bd25719a7130d0/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Management/commands/management/GetContentCommand.cs

comments.author: sarithsutha
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan I'm interested in taking this up.  This would be my first time contributing to open source and this one seemed like a good place to start.

comments.author: sarithsutha
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT @adityapatwardhan Is there a way to run the code coverage report before submitting a PR?

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body:
You may want to have a have a look at https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/powershell/2017/01/11/code-coverage-now-available-for-powershell-core/
